DOC.brief_summary: This study assess pharmacokinetics MK-0941 participant vary degree renal insufficiency .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Investigate Pharmacokinetics MK-0941 Participants With Renal Insufficiency ( MK-0941-015-02 )
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female age 18 75 year Female childbearing potential appropriate method contraception Body mass index ( BMI ) less equal 40 kg/m2 Participant good health Participant diagnose Type 2 Diabetes Participant agree follow smoke restriction Willing follow study diet restriction Mental legal incapacitation Participant kidney remove History Type 1 diabetes History stroke , chronic seizure major neurological disorder History neoplastic disease Nursing mother Consumes great 4 glass alcoholic beverage per day Consumes great 6 serving caffeinated beverage per day Participant surgery donate 1 unit blood within 1 month screen Participant history recent eye infection within 2 week study drug administration Clinically diagnose glaucoma blindness Has trauma one eye
